abstract: Stocks drop sharply due to disappointing company earnings reports and falling oil prices.

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Closes Sharply Lower as Oil Prices Fall and Earnings Disappoint
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Lower as Oil Prices Fall

snippet: Shares of the genetics research company Illumina dropped after the company announced third-quarter revenue below what analysts were looking for....
lead_paragraph: Shares of the genetics research company Illumina dropped after the company announced third-quarter revenue below what analysts were looking for.
